languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс кивает.{/n} "Все верно — мне надлежит терпимее относиться к ошибкам свеженазначенного Вольного Торговца. Если быть откровенным, я удивлен: Лорд-инквизитор не склонен попустительствовать слабости души и разума — даже если речь о человеке вроде тебя, лишь недавно принявш{mf|его|ую} на себя бремя высокого титула".

{n}Heinrix nods.{/n} "That is correct. I should show greater tolerance for the mistakes of a newly appointed Rogue Trader. To be frank, I am surprised: the Lord Inquisitor is not the type to indulge the weakness of soul and mind — even in someone who only recently accepted the burden of a lofty title."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс кивает.{/n} "Все верно — мне надлежит терпимее относиться к ошибкам свеженазначенного Вольного Торговца. Если быть откровенным, я удивлен: Лорд-инквизитор не склонен попустительствовать слабости души и разума — даже если речь о человеке вроде тебя, лишь недавно принявш{mf|его|ую} на себя бремя высокого титула".

To be frank, I am surprised: Lord Inquisitor is not the type to indulge the weakness of soul and mind — even if we are talking about a person who only recently accepted the burden of a lofty title".

{n}Heinrix nods.{/n} "This is correct. I should be more patient towards the mistakes of the newly appointed Rogue Trader. To be frank, I am surprised: Lord Inquisitor is not the type to indulge the weakness of soul and mind — even if we are talking about a person who only recently accepted the burden of a lofty title".

{n}Heinrix nods.{/n} "That is correct. I should show greater tolerance for the mistakes of a newly appointed Rogue Trader. To be frank, I am surprised: the Lord Inquisitor is not the type to indulge the weakness of soul and mind — even in someone who only recently accepted the burden of a lofty title."

To be frank, I am surprised: the Lord Inquisitor is not the type to indulge the weakness of soul and mind — even in someone who only recently accepted the burden of a lofty title."

{n}Heinrix nods.{/n} "That is correct. I should show greater tolerance for the mistakes of a newly appointed Rogue Trader. To be frank, I am surprised: the Lord Inquisitor is not the type to indulge the weakness of soul and mind — even in someone who only recently accepted the burden of a lofty title."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix asiente.{/n} «Es cierto. Debería mostrar más tolerancia hacia los errores de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente recién nombrad{mf|o|a}. Para serle sincero, me sorprende: el Lord Inquisidor no suele tolerar debilidades en la mente y el alma de la gente, aunque sea alguien que acaba de aceptar la carga de una posición elevada».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix nods.{/n} "That is correct. I should show greater tolerance for the mistakes of a newly appointed Rogue Trader. To be frank, I am surprised: the Lord Inquisitor is not the type to indulge the weakness of soul and mind — even in someone who only recently accepted the burden of a lofty title."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix asiente.{/n} «Es cierto. Debería mostrar más tolerancia hacia los errores de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente recién nombrad{mf|o|a}. Para serle sincero, me sorprende: el Lord Inquisidor no suele tolerar debilidades en la mente y el alma de la gente, aunque sea alguien que acaba de aceptar la carga de una posición elevada».

languages.text: {n}海因里希点了点头。{/n}“是这样的，我应该对新上任的行商浪人犯下的错误更宽容些才对。老实说，这让我很惊讶，因为大审判官大人并不是那种乐于放纵灵魂与思想弱点的人。即便是对刚刚踏上高位，肩负重任的人，他也不会区别对待。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix nods.{/n} "That is correct. I should show greater tolerance for the mistakes of a newly appointed Rogue Trader. To be frank, I am surprised: the Lord Inquisitor is not the type to indulge the weakness of soul and mind — even in someone who only recently accepted the burden of a lofty title."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希点了点头。{/n}“是这样的，我应该对新上任的行商浪人犯下的错误更宽容些才对。老实说，这让我很惊讶，因为审判长大人并不是那种乐于放纵灵魂与思想弱点的人。即便是对刚刚踏上高位，肩负重任的人，他也不会区别对待。”

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは頷く。{/n}「その通り。自由開拓者に新しく任命されたのです、ミスはもっと甘く見てやらないといけませんね。正直驚いていますよ。ロード・インクィジターは、つい最近、重く立派な称号を授かったばかりの人間相手でも、魂と心から溢れた弱さを甘んじて受け入れるタイプではありませんからね」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix nods.{/n} "That is correct. I should show greater tolerance for the mistakes of a newly appointed Rogue Trader. To be frank, I am surprised: the Lord Inquisitor is not the type to indulge the weakness of soul and mind — even in someone who only recently accepted the burden of a lofty title."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは頷く。{/n}「その通り。自由開拓者に新しく任命されたのです、ミスはもっと甘く見てやらないといけませんね。正直驚いていますよ。ロード・インクィジターは、つい最近、重く立派な称号を授かったばかりの人間相手でも、魂と心から溢れた弱さを甘んじて受け入れるタイプではありませんからね」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix nickt.{/n} "Das ist korrekt. Ich sollte eine größere Toleranz für die Fehler eines erst kürzlich ernannten Freihändlers zeigen. Allerdings bin ich überrascht. Der Großinquisitor zeigt sich hinsichtlich der Schwäche von Verstand und Seele für gewöhnlich nicht nachsichtig ... auch nicht bei jemandem, der die Bürde eines stolzen Titels erst kürzlich auf sich genommen hat."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix nods.{/n} "That is correct. I should show greater tolerance for the mistakes of a newly appointed Rogue Trader. To be frank, I am surprised: the Lord Inquisitor is not the type to indulge the weakness of soul and mind — even in someone who only recently accepted the burden of a lofty title."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix nickt.{/n} "Das ist korrekt. Ich sollte eine größere Toleranz für die Fehler eines erst kürzlich ernannten Freihändlers zeigen. Allerdings bin ich überrascht. Der Großinquisitor zeigt sich hinsichtlich der Schwäche von Verstand und Seele für gewöhnlich nicht nachsichtig ... auch nicht bei jemandem, der die Bürde eines stolzen Titels erst kürzlich auf sich genommen hat."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix hoche la tête.{/n} « Tout à fait. Il m'a d'ailleurs demandé de pardonner plus volontiers les erreurs d'{mf|un libre-marchand nouvellement nommé|une libre-marchande nouvellement nommée}. Je ne vous cache pas ma surprise: le seigneur inquisiteur n'est pas du genre à tolérer la faiblesse de l'âme et de l'esprit, même chez quelqu'un qui vient d'endosser le fardeau d'un titre prestigieux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix nods.{/n} "That is correct. I should show greater tolerance for the mistakes of a newly appointed Rogue Trader. To be frank, I am surprised: the Lord Inquisitor is not the type to indulge the weakness of soul and mind — even in someone who only recently accepted the burden of a lofty title."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix hoche la tête.{/n} « Tout à fait. Il m'a d'ailleurs demandé de pardonner plus volontiers les erreurs d'{mf|un libre-marchand nouvellement nommé|une libre-marchande nouvellement nommée}. Je ne vous cache pas ma surprise: le seigneur inquisiteur n'est pas du genre à tolérer la faiblesse de l'âme et de l'esprit, même chez quelqu'un qui vient d'endosser le fardeau d'un titre prestigieux. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix onaylar anlamda başını sallıyor.{/n} "Bu doğru. Yeni atanmış bir Hür Tacir'in hatalarına karşı daha fazla tolerans göstermeliyim. Açıkçası şaşkınım... Lord Engizisyoncu, ruhtaki ve zihindeki zayıflıklara müsamaha gösteren biri değildir. Kişi yakın bir zamanda azametli bir ünvan elde etmiş olsa bile bu böyledir."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix nods.{/n} "That is correct. I should show greater tolerance for the mistakes of a newly appointed Rogue Trader. To be frank, I am surprised: the Lord Inquisitor is not the type to indulge the weakness of soul and mind — even in someone who only recently accepted the burden of a lofty title."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix onaylar anlamda başını sallıyor.{/n} "Bu doğru. Yeni atanmış bir Hür Tacir'in hatalarına karşı daha fazla tolerans göstermeliyim. Açıkçası şaşkınım: Lord Engizisyoncu ruhtaki ve zihindeki zayıflıklara müsamaha gösteren biri değildir. O kişi yakın bir zamanda azametli bir ünvan elde etmiş bile olsa."
